member.name: T:MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.Detour
member.summary: A fully managed detour. Multiple Detours for a method to detour from can exist at any given time. Detours can be layered. If you're writing your own detour manager or need to detour native functions, it's better to create instances of NativeDetour instead.

member.name: M:MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.Detour.Apply
member.summary: Mark the detour as applied in the detour chain. This can be done automatically when creating an instance.

member.name: M:MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.Detour.Undo
member.summary: Undo the detour without freeing it, allowing you to reapply it later.

member.name: M:MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.Detour.Free
member.summary: Free the detour, while also permanently undoing it. This makes any further operations on this detour invalid.

member.name: M:MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.Detour.Dispose
member.summary: Undo and free this temporary detour.

member.name: M:MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.Detour.GenerateTrampoline(System.Reflection.MethodBase)
member.summary: Generate a new DynamicMethod with which you can invoke the previous state.

member.name: M:MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.Detour.GenerateTrampoline``1
member.summary: Generate a new DynamicMethod with which you can invoke the previous state.

member.name: M:MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.Hook.GenerateTrampoline``1
member.summary: Generate a new DynamicMethod with which you can invoke the previous state.

member.name: T:MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.NativeDetour
member.summary: A "raw" native detour, acting as a wrapper around NativeDetourData with a few helpers. Only one NativeDetour for a method to detour from can exist at any given time. NativeDetours cannot be layered. If you don't need the trampoline generator or any of the management helpers, use DetourManager.Native directly. Unless you're writing your own detour manager or need to detour native functions, it's better to create instances of Detour instead.

member.name: M:MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.NativeDetour.Apply
member.summary: Apply the native detour. This can be done automatically when creating an instance.

member.name: M:MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.NativeDetour.Undo
member.summary: Undo the native detour without freeing the detour native data, allowing you to reapply it later.

member.name: M:MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.NativeDetour.Free
member.summary: Free the detour's data without undoing it. This makes any further operations on this detour invalid.

member.name: M:MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.NativeDetour.Dispose
member.summary: Undo and free this temporary detour.

member.name: M:MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.NativeDetour.GenerateTrampoline(System.Reflection.MethodBase)
member.summary: Generate a new DynamicMethod with which you can invoke the previous state. If the NativeDetour holds a reference to a managed method, a copy of the original method is returned. If the NativeDetour holds a reference to a native function, an "undo-call-redo" trampoline with a matching signature is returned.

member.name: M:MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.NativeDetour.GenerateTrampoline``1
member.summary: Generate a new delegate with which you can invoke the previous state. If the NativeDetour holds a reference to a managed method, a copy of the original method is returned. If the NativeDetour holds a reference to a native function, an "undo-call-redo" trampoline with a matching signature is returned.

member.name: M:MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.DetourHelper.Write(System.IntPtr,System.Int32@,System.Byte)
member.summary: Write the given value at the address to + offs, afterwards advancing offs by sizeof(byte).

member.name: M:MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.DetourHelper.Write(System.IntPtr,System.Int32@,System.UInt16)
member.summary: Write the given value at the address to + offs, afterwards advancing offs by sizeof(ushort).

member.name: M:MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.DetourHelper.Write(System.IntPtr,System.Int32@,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Write the given value at the address to + offs, afterwards advancing offs by sizeof(ushort).

member.name: M:MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.DetourHelper.Write(System.IntPtr,System.Int32@,System.UInt64)
member.summary: Write the given value at the address to + offs, afterwards advancing offs by sizeof(ulong).

member.name: M:MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.DetourHelper.GenerateNativeProxy(System.IntPtr,System.Reflection.MethodBase)
member.summary: Generate a DynamicMethod to easily call the given native function from another DynamicMethod.
member.param: The pointer to the native function to call.
A MethodBase with the target function's signature.

member.name: M:MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.DetourHelper.StubCriticalDetour(MonoMod.Utils.DynamicMethodDefinition)
member.summary: Fill the DynamicMethodDefinition with a throw.

member.name: M:MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.DetourHelper.EmitDetourCopy(Mono.Cecil.Cil.ILProcessor,System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr,System.Byte)
member.summary: Emit a call to DetourManager.Native.Copy using the given parameters.

member.name: M:MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.DetourHelper.EmitDetourApply(Mono.Cecil.Cil.ILProcessor,MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.NativeDetourData)
member.summary: Emit a call to DetourManager.Native.Apply using a copy of the given data.

member.name: T:MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.NativeDetourData
member.summary: The data forming a "raw" native detour, created and consumed by DetourManager.Native.

member.name: F:MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.NativeDetourData.Method
member.summary: The method to detour from. Set when the structure is created by the IDetourNativePlatform.

member.name: F:MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.NativeDetourData.Target
member.summary: The target method to be called instead. Set when the structure is created by the IDetourNativePlatform.

member.name: F:MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.NativeDetourData.Type
member.summary: The type of the detour. Determined when the structure is created by the IDetourNativePlatform.

member.name: F:MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.NativeDetourData.Size
member.summary: The size of the detour. Calculated when the structure is created by the IDetourNativePlatform.

member.name: F:MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.NativeDetourData.Extra
member.summary: DetourManager.Native-specific data.
